task.title: Configure or Refresh an Instagram Social Account
task.shortdesc: You must configure a social account in Instagram to request rights or search Instagram in streams and the library.

context.p: When you set up an Instagram social account for the first time, follow this process.
To configure a social account for Instagram:

step.cmd: Navigate to the Social Accounts section under Network Settings.
Click Login with Instagram under Instagram Accounts. A dialog box pops up to allow you to authorize the Livefyre Social Curation app.
Log into an Instagram account or click a link in the lower left of the box to log in to a different account.
Add a Display Name for the account, then click Save Settings. Click on Social Account in the header of the account info box to collapse the account.
